code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild deterioration of eye sight, mild problem with seeing at night and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat x 5 weeks. pt is a 22 year old female. o:Height 70 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:female student aged 22 years indicates mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight. o:Height 70 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
